Let me think of the DP as follows: 

For each node u, we have an array dp[u][i], which is the number of ways to assign values to the subtree rooted at u such that the value of u is exactly i, and the left and right subtrees have all values less than i. Then, the total number of ways for the subtree rooted at u with maximum value at most m is the sum_{i=1 to m} dp[u][i].
